text: Sterling Hofrichter (born December 5, 1996) is an American football punter for the Atlanta Falcons of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Syracuse. ==Early years== Hofrichter attended and played high school football at Armwood High School. ==College career== Playing at Syracuse from 2015–2019, Hofrichter mainly lined up at punter, but attempted four field goals and did kickoffs for two seasons. Over his collegiate career, he totaled 270 punts for 11,651 net yards for a 43.2 average == Professional career == Hofrichter was selected by the Atlanta Falcons in the seventh round with the 228th overall pick in the 2020 NFL Draft. ==References== ==External links== *Atlanta Falcons bio *Syracuse Orange bio Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Valrico, Florida Category:Players of American football from Florida Category:Sportspeople from Hillsborough County, Florida Category:American football placekickers Category:American football punters Category:Syracuse Orange football players Category:Atlanta Falcons players
title: Sterling Hofrichter
